platform.game.graphic

Class SelectGravity

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.game.Actor
      • platform.game.block.Block
        • platform.game.button.Button
          • platform.game.graphic.SelectGravity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Actor>

    public class SelectGravity
extends Button
    Allows the user to change the Gravity. Inspired by the game VVVVVV, 2010, by Nicalis (Terry Cavanagh, Magnus Palsson)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
